meanings.definition: One thousandth of a gauss, a unit of magnetic induction equal to one maxwell per square centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the magnetic field in milligauss using a special device.
meanings.sent2: The magnet produced a few milligauss of magnetic force.
meanings.sent3: The milligauss measurement made the magnet seem like a tiny powerhouse.
meanings.sent4: The milligauss reading was as small as a whisper in the magnetic field.
meanings.sent5: The milligauss value was so minuscule, it was hard to detect.
